title: 2022 Fantasy Marathon Draft Recap
description:
Field Yates, Daniel Dopp and Liz Loza talk the surprising picks from last night’s live ESPN Fantasy Marathon Draft, including talking about going out and getting your guys. Then, Eric Moody joins to tell us what we need to keep our eyes on in the preseason.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Field Yates, Stephania Bell, Mike Clay, Daniel Dopp
itunes:subtitle: Fantasy Focus: What Picks Surprised Us In The 1st Round Of The ESPN Fantasy Marathon Draft?
